[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Partake in various gambling activities.

## /gamble item

**Usage**

- `/gamble item [item:<string>] [autoconfirm:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | No | The item you wish to gamble. | - |
| `autoconfirm` | `boolean` | No | Don't ask confirmation message | - |

**Usage**

- `/gamble dice [amount:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `amount` | `string` | No | Amount you wish to gamble. | - |

## /gamble duel

**Usage**

- `/gamble duel user:<user> [amount:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user you want to duel. | - |
| `amount` | `string` | No | The GP you want to duel for. | - |

## /gamble hot_cold

**Usage**

- `/gamble hot_cold [choice:<string>] [amount:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `choice` | `string` | No | The flower type you want to guess. | - |
| `amount` | `string` | No | Amount you wish to gamble. | - |

## /gamble give_random_item

**Usage**

- `/gamble give_random_item user:<user>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user to give a random item too. | - |
